content.title: London
content.body: London is a political, historical, cultural, and tourist center of the United Kingdom, an important city and commercial spot in Western Europe.

content.title: Windsor Castle
content.body: Windsor Castle is one of the most known buildings and a royal residence in the county of Berkshire.

content.title: Tower Bridge
content.body: Tower Bridge is a combined bascule and suspension bridge in London, built between 1886 and 1894.
